hero.title: Building Your Dream Home
hero.subtitle: Professional construction and architectural services for residential and commercial projects

stats.title: 33 Years Of Undefeated Success
stats.description: Since 1992, we've been delivering exceptional construction services with unwavering dedication to quality and innovation. Our extensive experience ensures that every project is completed to the highest standards.

about.title: Committed To Keep People Healthy & Safe
about.description: At Hoxha Engineering, we prioritize sustainability and safety in every project we undertake. Our commitment to environmentally responsible construction practices ensures that our buildings not only stand the test of time but also contribute positively to the communities they serve.
about.practicesDescription: Our construction methodologies adhere to the highest industry standards, ensuring exceptional quality and durability in every project we complete.

founders.title: About Founders
founders.description: We are a leading local company in North Macedonia with a rich history of excellence in construction and engineering. Our leadership team brings decades of experience and a passion for innovation.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Meet our team of experts
aboutPage.storyDescription: Hoxha Engineering is a company specialized in construction and engineering with a rich history dating back to 1992. We have built our reputation through dedication to quality and innovation.
aboutPage.missionDescription: Our mission is to provide exceptional construction services that exceed client expectations and contribute to community development.
aboutPage.valuesDescription: We operate with integrity, transparency, and commitment to quality in every project we undertake.
aboutPage.teamDescription: Our team consists of qualified professionals with years of experience in the construction industry.

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Complete construction and engineering services
servicesPage.constructionDescription: We provide complete construction services for residential and commercial projects.
servicesPage.engineeringDescription: Our engineering expertise ensures that your projects are safe and sustainable.
servicesPage.projectManagementDescription: We manage your projects from start to finish.
servicesPage.consultationDescription: We provide professional consultation for all aspects of construction.
